page.title: 08Kilfrost - Haltwhistle.
page.content: Kilfrost is the factory where they make{anti-freeze}for car engines, aeroplanes, waggons, helicopters, building sites and oil rigs. The factory covers 4 acres beside the River Tyne. 34 people work at the factory including Lynne's dad. Inside the factory there are 17 overhead tanks and lots of pipes to carry the chemicals that make the different kinds of anti-freeze. They measure the chemicals with a computer operated valve into a big container that holds fifteen thousand litres. It looks like a gigantic cake mixer. The anti-freeze is kept in big storage tanks holding sixty thousand litres outside the factory. All the pipes are under the ground. The anti-freeze, packed in bright blue drums is exported to Europe, the Middle East, America and Canada.
